name: Starfell Legends DEMO
description:
DISCLAIMERS! This is NOT the full version! Only the prolouge can be played. Mac and Linux have NOT been tested. If issues occur, please leave feedback.

A RPG adventure through the lands of Everestia! Fight enemies, discover secrets, and unravel the mystery behind the mysterious mage. 12 chapters of adventure await!

The battle system is not your normal RPG maker battle system.  Action Commands allow you do deal more damage with special inputs!

Delve deep into 15+ dungeons! (1 available in the demo version) Each dungeon has their own special boss fight, as well as treasures and secrets to be found! Explore a vast world of mountains, forests, seas, and skies in this new adventure for PC!

Visit the full version's site:Starfell Legends by noclipgames (itch.io)
